column2: My body...it feels so heavy...
column3: My body...it feels so heavy...

column2: Oh! Something has changed. I feel...complete.
column3: Oh! I feel I've changed somehow. I feel...complete.

column2: What is this feeling?
column3: What is this feeling?

column2: I sense great power here.
column3: I sense great power here.

column2: Such intense power! Soon it will be a part of me!
column3: Such intense power! Soon I will make it my own!

column2: Fortune smiles upon us today!
column3: Fortune smiles upon us today!

column2: This feels...strange...
column3: Such a strange sensation...

column2: Is this the power of crystals?
column3: Is this the power of crystals?

column2: This power... My body needs time to adjust.
column3: I need time to adjust to this power...

column2: This aether is not quite like yours.
column3: This aether feels familiar, yet somehow different.

column2: The aether... It courses through me!
column3: I can feel the aether welling inside me!

column2: My power...it grows!
column3: My power...it grows!

column2: The aether is almost too much to bear!
column3: I am not sure how much more aether I can hold.

column2: Are you certain this is safe?
column3: This will not harm me?

column2: Soon this power will be mine to command.
column3: Soon I will make this power my own.

column2: Again I sup on the aether of crystals.
column3: Again I feast on the aether of crystals.

column2: I can feel the aether pouring into me.
column3: I can feel the aether flowing into me.

column2: The aether swells inside me.
column3: The aether swells inside me.

column2: With every grain of sand I grow stronger.
column3: With every grain of sand I gain strength.

column2: I have come to like this sand.
column3: I rather like this sand.

column2: Do you have more?
column3: Please, may I have some more?

column2: Mmm... This aether sustains me.
column3: Mmm... This aether sustains me.

column2: Soon I will achieve my full potential!
column3: Soon I will achieve my full potential!

column2: I sense new power within me.
column3: I sense new strength growing within me.

column2: I will repay you in kind.
column3: I shall share this strength with you.

column2: One day I will be worthy of this power.
column3: My strength is yours to command!

column2: I must become stronger!
column3: I will become stronger!

column2: I still have much room to improve.
column3: I still have much room to grow.

column2: This gift will not be wasted.
column3: This gift will not be wasted.

column2: It surges through me!
column3: It surges through me!

column2: Behold my newfound strength!
column3: Behold my newfound strength!

column2: When I am strong enough, no goal will be beyond our reach.
column3: When I am strong enough, no goal will be beyond our reach.

column2: Your enemies will tremble before our might!
column3: Your enemies will tremble before our might!

column2: My spirit has never burned so brightly!
column3: My spirit has never burned so fiercely!

column2: None can stand before our combined strength.
column3: None can stand before our combined strength.

column2: I look forward to putting this power to good use.
column3: I look forward to putting this power to good use.

column2: I must have more aether!
column3: I must have more aether!

column2: I am full to bursting with aether.
column3: I am full to bursting with aether.

column2: What have you got there?
column3: What have you got there?

column2: Have you need of me?
column3: Have you need of me?

column2: Is this a new form of training? Very well.
column3: Is this a new form of training? Very well.

column2: What are you planning to do?
column3: What are you planning to do?

column2: This will not hurt...will it?
column3: This will not hurt...will it?

column2: Will you use the sand again?
column3: Will you use the sand again?

column2: Let us begin.
column3: Let us begin.

column2: Ah, it is time once again to partake of the sand.
column3: Ah, it is time once again to partake of the sand.

column2: I am ready.
column3: I am ready.

column2: You called?
column3: You called?

column2: I have been looking forward to this.
column3: I have been looking forward to this.

column2: More... I must have more.
column3: More... I must have more.

column2: I wish to become stronger...for your sake.
column3: I wish to become stronger...for your sake.

column2: Another chance to grow.
column3: Another chance to grow.

column2: What have you got there?
column3: What have you got there?

column2: Are we going to see that woman again?
column3: Are we going to see that woman again?

column2: Is something the matter?
column3: Is something wrong?

column2: Should I become swifter, or perhaps more attentive?
column3: Should I become swifter, or perhaps more attentive?

column2: Do I appear...different?
column3: Have I...changed somehow?

column2: When will we use the sand again?
column3: When will we use the sand again?

column2: Does my progress please you?
column3: Does my progress please you?

column2: I have grown much since we began.
column3: I have grown much since we began.

column2: I feel I have changed somehow.
column3: I feel I have changed somehow.

column2: What will we focus on next?
column3: What will we focus on next?

column2: I hope I am to your satisfaction.
column3: I hope I am to your satisfaction.

column2: Will we return to the woman soon? I wish to use more sand.
column3: Will we return to the woman soon? I wish to use more sand.

column2: I feel I have developed quite well, would you not agree?
column3: I feel I have developed quite well, would you not agree?

column2: It makes me nervous when you stare like that.
column3: It makes me nervous when you stare like that.

column2: Untreated sand? But the woman said not to use that...
column3: Untreated sand? But the woman said not to use that...
